posts.post_content:
I'm looking to build a lower grade T205 Boston Rustlers team set, and I need just two more cards to have it finished up.

I prefer cards with good centering, only minor creases (no creases through the face or large, ugly creases - a stray wrinkle is fine), no paper loss, no trimming at all, and edge/corner wear is acceptable.

I need:
Ed Abbaticchio
Bayard Sharpe

Let me know what you have - looking to be somewhere between $25-40/each on these, would go a touch more for a card I really like.

Thanks!
Just acquired a Peaches Graham, just 5 more to go for the team set! Who has what I'm looking for?
Just acquired a Cecil Ferguson, just 4 more to go! Who's got 'em?

Grabbed a Herzog on eBay! 3 more to go!

Still Need:

Abbaticchio
Beck
Sharpe

awesome..your almost there

 give me your mailing address..I have that 52B I need to send to you

 RalG

Who's got 'em today?!

Looking for Abbaticchio, Beck, and Sharpe!
Still looking for Abbaticchio, Beck, and Sharpe!
Grabbed a Fred Beck online, just two more to go!
